entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Rondeau (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:15 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow this morning. Snow or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain beginning later this morning changing to freezing rain this afternoon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain mixed with freezing rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Rain with freezing rain this evening and after midnight and with periods of freezing drizzle overnight. Local rainfall amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 near midnight then becoming light before morning. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of drizzle mixed with freezing drizzle. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle. Drizzle or periods of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Windy. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. High 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
